about.title: About
about.jesdfsavec: I'm a fullstack web developer with
about.1p: of practical experience. I have a solid understanding of web development principles, using a wide range of technologies, frameworks and programming tools to create user-friendly and responsive websites.
about.2p: With experience in delivering high-quality projects, I am proficient in UI/UX design, client-side technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript, as well as server-side technologies such as Node.js and PHP.
